thread.title: Under Armour's new football cleats are Peak Maryland
thread.title_full: Under Armour's new football cleats are Peak Maryland

author: Jonas Shaffer
title: Under Armour's new football cleats are Peak Maryland
text:
Under Armour's new football cleats are Peak Maryland Facing backlash after Trump praise, Under Armour says: 'We engage in policy, not politics' 
Facing a backlash after its CEO praised President Donald Trump, Under Armour said today: "We engage in policy, not politics." 
Facing a backlash after its CEO praised President Donald Trump, Under Armour said today: "We engage in policy, not politics." Jonas Shaffer or have no problem paying what it costs to fly from Baltimore to Dallas for graffiti footwear, then wrap yourself in the Maryland flag, dip your face in Old Bay seasoning and behold: UA Highlight MC – Limited Edition Under Armour UA Highlight MC – Limited Edition Under Armour UA Highlight MC – Limited Edition Under Armour Under Armour 
There are nine colorways available for the UA Highlight MC – Limited Edition . You can tell Maryland's by the presence of the mustachioed Edgar Allan Poe . 
Other Maryland iconography: "The STAR SPANGLED BANNER" and "FT. MCHENRY * BALTIMORE" in a Fort McHenry-shaped outline, backed by the colors of the American flag U.S. Navy officer cap
